title: League Client feels incredibly laggy and unresponsive this evening
body:
League Client feels incredibly laggy and unresponsive this evening.
My internet is fine, in-game is fine. Just the client.

replies.body:
Hi folks

I'm seeing some general internet weirdness tonight, and it looks like some ISPs are reporting similar.  Going to do some digging now and let you know what I find out.

Cheers
Mindstar
What ISPs are you with?  I'm with Aussie and they just reported this - https://www.aussiebroadband.com.au/support/outage-reference/#47407

From what I can see it looks like a couple of ISPs have had issues with international links to the USA tonight.  Over on [Whirlpool ](https://forums.whirlpool.net.au)it is reported on the Telstra and AussieBroadband boards, with a number of online services affected.  You can also see an uptick of reports on [AussieOutages](http://aussieoutages.com/).  These are a few good tools to check on when weird stuff happens btw!

Given that many non-gameplay related parts of LoL are in the USA, this would explain what you are seeing.  The status page for Aussie above is the best I've found so far for the issue so I'd recommend keeping an eye on that.

Just updating - it looks like things are starting to normal.

Cheers!
Mindstar

I to am having the same issue, just dodged a Que because i wasn't able to select a champ! Now i cant even click anything on the main menu's 
Same thing my internet is as usual, and in-game was fine
